job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Generative AI Engineer
       Amsterdam-Duivendrecht Bachelor | University Fulltime Marktconform
       Amsterdam-Duivendrecht
       Bachelor | University
       Fulltime
       Marktconform
       Sluitingsdatum: 31-01-2025
       At Catalyze, we're forming a team of AI and technology innovators to create the most advanced AI-powered grant-writing assistant in the industry. Our mission is to empower organizations by simplifying the grant-writing process, allowing them to improve efficiency and focus on their impactful work. If you're passionate about AI, NLP, and developing meaningful solutions to create an impact, Catalyze invites you to contribute to transforming how organizations secure funding.
       Our innovation-driven team will leverage cutting-edge AI and NLP technologies to help organizations streamline their grant applications, improve proposal quality, and increase their success rates. We're looking for curious, driven professionals who are ready to tackle meaningful challenges.
       Catalyze is hiring! We're forming a team of innovators who would transform how organizations apply for grants. We're looking for Generative AI Engineers, Data Scientists, Full Stack Developers to build the most advanced AI -powered grant writing assistant in the industry.
       Join us to shape the future of grant writing! Explore our open positions in AI, data science, and software development, and join us in building a solution that will empower organizations to make a difference.
       Grow your career - expand your skills and responsibilities
       Build something new - Its a new team being build, be a part of that, be entrepreneurial, take ownership, be creative .
       Generative AI Engineer
       At Catalyze, we're committed to transforming the grant-writing process with cutting-edge AI technology. As a Generative AI Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in building the most advanced AI-powered grant-writing assistant in the industry. This role is perfect for someone who is curious, a natural problem solver, and passionate about NLP and machine learning. You'll leverage your expertise to design and deploy LLM-based solutions that simplify and elevate how grant proposals are crafted, directly impacting organizations' mission in driving meaningful innovation projects. This role provides a unique opportunity to lead a unique and important project for Catalyze in a dynamic environment., + Lead the technical design and implementation of the project using LLM's (e.g., GPT-3, GPT-4) for the grant writing assistant.
          + Work with large datasets for data preprocessing and engineering and manage the data annotation process.
          + Integrate models into backend systems using frameworks like Django or Flask.
          + Collaborate with frontend developers to create seamless user experiences.
          + Optimize the AI model for text quality and accuracy based on historical grant data.
          + Conduct POC testing, validate model output, and iterate for performance improvements.
          + Ensure all AI/ML operations comply with data privacy and other security regulations.

Generative AI Engineer

Generative AI Engineer

       At Catalyze, we're forming a team of AI and technology innovators to create the most advanced AI-powered grant-writing assistant in the industry. Our mission is to empower organizations by simplifying the grant-writing process, allowing them to improve efficiency and focus on their impactful work. If you're passionate about AI, NLP, and developing meaningful solutions to create an impact, Catalyze invites you to contribute to transforming how organizations secure funding.
       Our innovation-driven team will leverage cutting-edge AI and NLP technologies to help organizations streamline their grant applications, improve proposal quality, and increase their success rates. We're looking for curious, driven professionals who are ready to tackle meaningful challenges.
       Catalyze is hiring! We're forming a team of innovators who would transform how organizations apply for grants. We're looking for Generative AI Engineers, Data Scientists, Full Stack Developers to build the most advanced AI -powered grant writing assistant in the industry.
       Join us to shape the future of grant writing! Explore our open positions in AI, data science, and software development, and join us in building a solution that will empower organizations to make a difference.
       Grow your career - expand your skills and responsibilities
       Build something new - Its a new team being build, be a part of that, be entrepreneurial, take ownership, be creative .
       Generative AI Engineer
       At Catalyze, we're committed to transforming the grant-writing process with cutting-edge AI technology. As a Generative AI Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in building the most advanced AI-powered grant-writing assistant in the industry. This role is perfect for someone who is curious, a natural problem solver, and passionate about NLP and machine learning. You'll leverage your expertise to design and deploy LLM-based solutions that simplify and elevate how grant proposals are crafted, directly impacting organizations' mission in driving meaningful innovation projects. This role provides a unique opportunity to lead a unique and important project for Catalyze in a dynamic environment., + Lead the technical design and implementation of the project using LLM's (e.g., GPT-3, GPT-4) for the grant writing assistant.
          + Work with large datasets for data preprocessing and engineering and manage the data annotation process.
          + Integrate models into backend systems using frameworks like Django or Flask.
          + Collaborate with frontend developers to create seamless user experiences.
          + Optimize the AI model for text quality and accuracy based on historical grant data.
          + Conduct POC testing, validate model output, and iterate for performance improvements.
          + Ensure all AI/ML operations comply with data privacy and other security regulations.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and deployment of AI-powered grant-writing assistant using LLMs (e.g., GPT-3, GPT-4). Core responsibilities include leading the technical design and implementation of LLM-based solutions, working with large datasets for preprocessing and engineering, integrating models into backend systems, and optimizing AI models for text quality and accuracy. These align directly with the definition and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer, particularly the focus on generative models, LLM frameworks, and building production-grade user-facing software systems.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'design and deploy LLM-based solutions' and 'Optimize the AI model for text quality and accuracy' directly relate to the creation, adaptation, and fine-tuning of machine learning models, specifically generative ones.
The mention of 'LLM's (e.g., GPT-3, GPT-4)' indicates the use and development of generative models.
The phrase 'Optimize the AI model for text quality and accuracy' refers to the process of fine-tuning and improving the performance of a model.
job_tasks.phrase: Optimize the AI model for text quality and accuracy

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work with large datasets for data preprocessing and engineering' directly refers to the tasks involved in preparing and manipulating data for model training.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with large datasets for data preprocessing and engineering

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Integrate models into backend systems using frameworks like Django or Flask' describes the process of building and connecting software components, which is a core software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrate models into backend systems using frameworks like Django or Flask

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with frontend developers to create seamless user experiences' indicates involvement in building user-facing applications, a key aspect of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with frontend developers to create seamless user experiences

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Conduct POC testing, validate model output, and iterate for performance improvements' describes iterative testing and validation processes common in MLOps for ensuring model performance.
job_tasks.phrase: Conduct POC testing, validate model output, and iterate for performance improvements

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Ensure all AI/ML operations comply with data privacy and other security regulations' points to the operational aspects of managing AI systems, including compliance and security.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure all AI/ML operations comply with data privacy and other security regulations

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'empower organizations by simplifying the grant-writing process, allowing them to improve efficiency and focus on their impactful work' describes the business goal and impact of the AI solution.
job_tasks.phrase: empower organizations by simplifying the grant-writing process, allowing them to improve efficiency and focus on their impactful work

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'transforming how organizations secure funding' clearly articulates the business problem and the desired outcome of the project.
The phrase 'empower organizations to make a difference' highlights the business value and mission alignment of the product.
job_tasks.phrase: empower organizations to make a difference

soft_skills.phrase: be entrepreneurial, take ownership, be creative
